verses.verse: Forasmuch then <S%G3767>as<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> hath <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G3695>arm<s%> <S%G5210>yourselves<s%> <S%G2532>likewise<s%> with the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G1771>mind<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> he that hath <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> hath <S%G3973>ceased<s%> from <S%G266>sin<s%>;

<S%G1519>That<s%> <S%G980>he<s%> no <S%G3371>longer<s%> should <S%G980>live<s%> the <S%G1954>rest<s%> of his <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> to the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> to the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G3928>past<s%> of our <S%G979>life<s%> may <S%G713>suffice<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> to have <S%G2716>wrought<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>, when we <S%G4198>walked<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G766>lasciviousness<s%>, <S%G1939>lusts<s%>, excess of <S%G3632>wine<s%>, <S%G2970>revellings<s%>, <S%G4224>banquetings<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G111>abominable<s%> <S%G1495>idolatries<s%>:

<S%G1722>Wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> they think it <S%G3579>strange<s%> that <S%G5216>ye<s%> <S%G4936>run<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> with them <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G401>excess<s%> of <S%G810>riot<s%>, speaking evil <S%G987>of<s%> you:
<S%G3739>Who<s%> shall <S%G591>give<s%> <S%G3056>account<s%> to him that <S%G2192>is<s%> <S%G2093>ready<s%> to <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2198>quick<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> this <S%G5124>cause<s%> was the gospel <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to them that are <S%G3498>dead<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they might be <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G3303><s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%> of all <S%G3956>things<s%> is at <S%G1448>hand<s%>: be <S%G4993>ye<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4993>sober<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3525>watch<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4335>prayer<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G4253>above<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1618>fervent<s%> <S%G26>charity<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G26>charity<s%> shall <S%G2572>cover<s%> the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G266>sins<s%>. shall: or, will

<S%G2531>As<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> hath <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G5486>gift<s%>, even so <S%G1247>minister<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> one to <S%G1519>another<s%> <S%G1438><s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3623>stewards<s%> of the <S%G4164>manifold<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

If any <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%>, let him speak <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G3051>oracles<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>; if any <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G1247>minister<s%>, let him do it <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2479>ability<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5524>giveth<s%>: <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> may be <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2076>be<s%> <S%G1391>praise<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2904>dominion<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.

<S%G27>Beloved<s%>, think <S%G3579>it<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3579>strange<s%> concerning <S%G5213>the<s%> fiery <S%G4451>trial<s%> <S%G1722>which<s%> <S%G1096>is<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3986>try<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> though some strange <S%G3581>thing<s%> <S%G4819>happened<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>:

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G5463>rejoice<s%>, inasmuch <S%G2526>as<s%> ye are <S%G2841>partakers<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ's<s%> <S%G3804>sufferings<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%>, <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> shall be <S%G602>revealed<s%>, ye may be <S%G5463>glad<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> with exceeding <S%G21>joy<s%>.

<S%G1487>If<s%> ye be <S%G3679>reproached<s%> <S%G1722>for<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G3107>happy<s%> are ye; <S%G3754>for<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G373>resteth<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>: <S%G2596>on<s%> <S%G3303><s%> their <S%G846>part<s%> he is evil spoken <S%G987>of<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2596>on<s%> your <S%G5209>part<s%> he is <S%G1392>glorified<s%>.

<S%G1063>But<s%> <S%G3958>let<s%> <S%G3361>none<s%> <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G5406>murderer<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> as a <S%G2812>thief<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> as an <S%G2555>evildoer<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a busybody in other men's <S%G244>matters<s%>.

<S%G1161>Yet<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> any man suffer <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G5546>Christian<s%>, let <S%G153>him<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> be <S%G153>ashamed<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> let him <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3313>behalf<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> the <S%G2540>time<s%> is come that <S%G2917>judgment<s%> must <S%G756>begin<s%> <S%G575>at<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> it <S%G4412>first<s%> begin <S%G575>at<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>, <S%G5101>what<s%> shall the <S%G5056>end<s%> be of them that obey <S%G544>not<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>?

<S%G5620>Wherefore<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3908>let<s%> them that <S%G3958>suffer<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> commit the <S%G3908>keeping<s%> of <S%G1438>their<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%> to him <S%G1722>in<s%> well <S%G16>doing<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> unto a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G2939>Creator<s%>.
